name: Project Cicada
description:
PROJECT CICADA is a new space sim-strategy game in which the player controls fleets of smart and configurable AI ships. A complex amount of development is being put behind the creation and control of these AI ships with the aim to give the player complete control of every single aspect of the game.

Developed from personal ideas to passion project and now to indie development, PROJECT CICADA is a showcase of my skills I have acquired and passion for development.
